entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Mountain 1:00 PM AST Monday 13 February 2023

Dewpoint: -4.7°C

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High zero. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late this evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Monday 13 February 2023
